bibl.title: The Reappearance of Royal Sibling Marriage in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Considers why royal sibling marriage, having been practiced in Egypt in the Pharaonic era, reappeared in the Ptolemaic period, why the custom became more or less institutionalized over the course of time, and what the significance and consequences of the practice were.
bibl.seg: Carney Elizabeth D., The Reappearance of Royal Sibling Marriage in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Considers why royal sibling marriage, having been practiced in Egypt in the Pharaonic era, reappeared in the Ptolemaic period, why the custom became more or less institutionalized over the course of time, and what the significance and consequences of the practice were.
